SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ConfigHolder
Component that holds the configuration settings for the ticketing system.
Configuration
Represents the configuration settings for the ticketing system.
ConfigurationRepository
Repository interface for accessing Configuration documents in the MongoDB database.
Customer
Service class representing a customer that purchases tickets from the ticket pool.
Log
Represents a log entry in the ticketing system.
LogRepository
Repository interface for accessing Log documents in the MongoDB database.
LogService
Service class for managing log entries in the ticketing system.
MongodbConnection
Manages the connection to the MongoDB database for the ticketing system.
Ticket
Represents a ticket in the ticketing system.
TicketController
REST controller for managing tickets and system operations.
TicketPool
Component that manages a pool of tickets.
TicketRepository
Repository interface for accessing Ticket documents in the MongoDB database.
TicketService
Service class for managing tickets in the ticketing system.
TicketUpdateMessage
Represents a message containing updates about tickets in the ticketing system.
TicketWebSocketHandler
WebSocket handler for managing ticket notifications.
Vendor
Service class representing a vendor that releases tickets into the ticket pool.
WebSocketConfig
Configuration class for setting up WebSocket message broker.
WebSocketConnect
Configuration class for setting up CORS mappings for WebSocket connections.
WebSocketService
Service class for broadcasting ticket updates to WebSocket clients.
